title.text: Learning with Multiple Stacking for Named Entity Recognition

introductionContent.text: In this paper, we present a learning method using multiple stacking for named entity recognition.
In order to take into account the tags of the surrounding words, we propose a method which employs stacked learners using the tags predicted by the lower level learners.
We have applied this approach to the CoNLL-2002 shared task to improve abase system.
